titles.title: God Is Doing A Marvelous Thing

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
God is doing a marvellous thing
Finding the lost, healing the lame
The brokenhearted are singing again
And I'm a part of it all

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Hands that hung, now they are raised
Lips that were bitter now sing God's praise
And hearts that were hopeless find hope for each day
And I'm a part of it all

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
There is faith in lives where once there was doubt
Those taken in whom the world has turned out
And all the while learning what love's all about
And I'm a part of it all
